verses.text: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sheminith|strong="H8067"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Help, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* godly are no \w more|strong="H5921"\w*; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* faithful \w have|strong="H5921"\w* vanished \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* men.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* lie \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* another; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* speak \w with|strong="H3068"\w* flattering lips \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* double heart.

\w May|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7453"\w* all \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w every|strong="H7723"\w* boastful tongue.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* prevail. \w We|strong="H3605"\w* own \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*—\w who|strong="H3605"\w* can \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* master?”

“\w For|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* cause \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* oppressed \w and|strong="H8193"\w* \w for|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* groaning \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* needy, I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* now arise,” says \w the|strong="H1396"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* bring safety \w to|strong="H8193"\w* him \w who|strong="H4310"\w* yearns.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* flawless, \w like|strong="H3068"\w* silver refined \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* furnace, \w like|strong="H3068"\w* gold purified sevenfold.

You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep us; You \w will|strong="H3068"\w* forever guard us \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* generation.
\w The|strong="H8104"\w* wicked wander freely, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* vileness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* exalted \w among|strong="H4480"\w* men.
